review: Constantly disconnects and looses audio. I have to reset it, quit and reopen and try unplugging multiple times and even then it's a crap shoot to see if it going to connect or not.  And if you don't have fast a network where you use it you can forget about it.  Works great for the first few minutes or sometimes halfway through a movie if you're lucky... unfortunately I have yet to watch a whole movie without it disconnecting on me.  Finally got fed up after about 5 weeks of troubleshooting and I lost the return window. To top that off, the rate of disconnecting is becoming more frequent. If you decide to test it out, be sure to return it before it's too late.
author: Mechanic Mike

review: I'm very disappointed that the package was messed up. I was given an used item with a broken seal. A BIG "reconnect me and 'jeepher WiFi not available" popped out on the TV once it was connected. For sure the chromecast was own by another person before. That really got into trouble as I bought it on behalf of my boss. My boss thought I sold him my used chromecast on full value. Now I got to rush to get a new, a really new, chromecast and refund all the money to my boss to proof my innocent. All thanks to Amazon.
